item.title: 香港法官裁定 Segantii 案将移交地方法院审理
item.description: Segantii 资本管理公司的内幕交易案将移交地方法院，该法院可判处长达七年的更长刑期。【原文：Segantii Capital Management’s insider trading case will move to a District Court that can hand out longer prison sentences of as many as seven years.】

item.title: 汇丰增持中国基金合资公司股份，成为主要股东
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）同意收购其合作伙伴在一家中国基金合资企业中的部分股份，成为该公司的大股东，并进一步扩大其在世界第二大经济体的业务。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc agreed to buy part of its partner’s stake in a China fund venture, becoming a majority shareholder and adding to its expansion in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利计划为澳大利亚富豪客户提供人工智能工具
item.description: 摩根士丹利计划在澳大利亚使用人工智能功能管理富人的投资组合，这家华尔街银行将在澳大利亚推出更多在世界其他地区使用的软件。【原文：Morgan Stanley plans to use artificial intelligence capabilities to manage rich people’s portfolios in Australia as the Wall Street bank roll outs more software in the country that’s used in other parts of the world.】

item.title: 激进对冲基金因向研究人员秘密付款而受罚
item.description: 美国对激进做空者的全面调查已产生了第一个显著的惩罚结果，同时也让人们罕见地看到了看跌研究人员与对冲基金之间有争议的合作，这些基金对公司下了很大的赌注。【原文：A sweeping US probe of activist short sellers has yielded its first notable punishment, while offering a rare glimpse into controversial collaborations between bearish researchers and hedge funds that place big bets against companies.】

item.title: 日本国债成为亚洲最差债券，日本央行债务拖累难堪重负
item.description: 日本政府债券已成为亚太地区表现最差的主权债务，原因是人们担心日本央行的货币政策举措的可预测性低于其他国家。【原文：Japanese government bonds have become the worst-performing sovereign debt in Asia-Pacific due to concern that the Bank of Japan’s monetary policy moves have become less predictable than its peers.】

item.title: 美联储将韩元的底线重新牢牢掐住
item.description: 在美联储做出政策决定之前，韩元可能会在 1 美元兑 1400 韩元左右的水平线上划线，因为韩元再次接近这一关键水平。【原文：South Korea is likely to draw a line in the sand for the won at around 1,400 per dollar, as the currency approaches that key level again ahead of the Federal Reserve’s policy decision.】

item.title: 中国考虑禁止银行代销对冲基金产品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国监管机构正在考虑对银行向公众销售金融产品的方式实施更严格的限制，此举可能会切断中国一些最大对冲基金的主要销售渠道。【原文：Chinese regulators are considering tougher restrictions on how banks sell financial products to the public, in a move that could cut off a major distribution channel for some of the nation’s largest hedge funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利银行家称澳大利亚是应对中国困境的避风港
item.description: 摩根士丹利澳大利亚主管理查德-瓦格纳（Richard Wagner）表示，澳大利亚正受益于资本流动的增加，这巩固了其在全球动荡时期缓冲投资风险的能力。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s Australia chief Richard Wagner said the country is benefiting from an increase in capital flows that cements its ability to cushion investment risk during a period of global turbulence.】

item.title: 穆迪称孟加拉国塔卡将因汇率下跌而再创新低
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）称，随着孟加拉中央银行放松对货币的控制，孟加拉塔卡有可能进一步跌至历史最低点。【原文：Bangladesh’s taka is likely to fall deeper into a record-low territory as the central bank loosens its grip on the currency, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国考虑对中国芯片准入实施更多限制。交易员在等待美国通胀和美联储利率决议。Pimco预计将有更多地区性银行倒闭。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The US considers more restrictions on China’s chip access. Traders await US inflation and Fed rate decision. Pimco expects more regional bank failures. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存减少后石油上涨
item.description: 在国际能源署（IEA）发布市场前景报告之前，行业数据显示美国原油库存缩减，石油延续涨势。【原文：Oil extended gains after industry data pointed to shrinking US crude stockpiles ahead of a report from the IEA on the market outlook.】

item.title: 投资者担心辛鲍姆赢面过大，比索遭重挫
item.description: 墨西哥当选总统本应继承世界上表现最好的货币。然而，她面对的却是比索历史性的暴跌，这给她上任初期的领导工作蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：Mexico’s president-elect was set to inherit the world’s top performing currency. Instead she’s confronting a historic slump in the peso that’s casting a pall over her early days in leadership.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰联席首席执行官称，尽管困难重重，私人信贷仍有活力
item.description: Blue Owl Capital Inc. 的马克-利普舒尔茨（Marc Lipschultz）说，私人信贷仍是投资的好去处，尽管一些业内人士警告说，私人信贷将面临疲软和更多的麻烦。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s Marc Lipschultz said private credit is still a good place to invest, even as some in the industry warn of weakness and more trouble ahead.】

item.title: 摩根大通风险互换最终在一个熟悉的地方结束：竞争对手银行
item.description:
SRT 交易的目的是将贷款风险转移出银行系统，但复杂证券的买家使用杠杆的行为却使这一目的受到质疑。【原文：

SRT trades are meant to shift loan risks out of the banking system, but the use of leverage by buyers of the complex securities is calling that into question.  

】

item.title: 美联储面临点阵图悬念，CPI迫在眉睫：决策日指南
item.description: 在为期两天的政策会议的最后一天公布一份关于消费者物价的重要报告之前，美联储官员可能还没有准备好最终确定备受关注的利率预测。【原文：Federal Reserve officials may not be ready to finalize closely watched projections for interest rates until the publication of a key report on consumer prices on the final day of their two-day policy meeting.】

item.title: 台湾保险公司正在出售创纪录的高风险债务
item.description: 台湾的人寿保险公司正在发行数量空前的债券，这给投资者带来了更多风险，因为它们急于在最后期限前改善财务状况，以充实资本。【原文：Life insurers in Taiwan are issuing an unprecedented amount of bonds that pose more risks to investors, as they rush to improve their finances before a deadline to shore up capital.】

item.title: 国债销售带动债券上涨；亚洲股市下跌：市场综述
item.description: 390 亿美元国债的稳健销售引发了人们的猜测，即周三的通胀数据将有助于为美联储今年降息提供依据，此后债券攀升。亚洲股市似乎将摆脱美国股市的利好，继续走低。【原文：Bonds climbed after a solid $39 billion Treasury sale triggered speculation that Wednesday’s inflation reading will help make the case for the Federal Reserve to cut rates this year. Asian stocks look set to shrug off the positive US session and track lower.】

item.title: 美联储双喜临门，"设置闹钟 "响彻亚洲办公桌
item.description: 酒井元成计划在本月经济日历上最重要的日子之一 "午夜烧油"。【原文：Motonari Sakai is planning to burn the midnight oil on one of the biggest days in the economic calendar this month.】

item.title: GameStop 在凯蒂猫带领下飙升，融资 21.4 亿美元
item.description: 基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）重返 YouTube 后大肆炒作 GameStop 股票，该公司利用股票大涨的机会，通过股票销售计划筹集了大约 21.4 亿美元。【原文：GameStop Corp. raised roughly $2.14 billion from a share sale program as it capitalized on a stock rally after Keith Gill talked up the shares following his return to YouTube.】

item.title: 勒梅尔警告：如果勒庞政党赢得选举，法国将面临债务危机
item.description: 财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔警告说，如果极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞赢得定于本月底举行的立法选举并实施其经济计划，法国将陷入债务危机。【原文：Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire warned that France would be plunged into a debt crisis if far-right leader Marine Le Pen were to win legislative elections slated for the end of the month and implement her economic program.】

item.title: 美联储会议和 CPI 数据公布前，债券交易员迅速放弃多头赌注
item.description: 在周三罕见的双重风险事件之前，交易员们正在迅速平仓对美国国债反弹的押注，因为就在美联储做出利率决定之前几小时，美国将公布通胀数据。【原文：Traders are rapidly unwinding bets for a rally in US Treasuries ahead of Wednesday’s rare double-risk event, with the release of inflation data coming just hours before a Federal Reserve interest-rate decision.】

item.title: 欧盟提议制裁航运巨头 Sovcomflot 以限制俄罗斯的收入
item.description: 据彭博社看到的一份文件显示，欧盟提议制裁俄罗斯石油运输巨头 Sovcomflot PJSC，以限制克里姆林宫资助其对乌克兰战争的能力。【原文：The European Union is proposing to sanction Russia’s oil-shipping giant Sovcomflot PJSC in a move to limit the Kremlin’s ability to finance its war against Ukraine, according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 巴西意外改税后中国抢购美国大豆
item.description: 世界最大的大豆出口国巴西出人意料地改变了税收，这促使中国买家抢购美国的大豆供应。【原文：A surprise tax change in Brazil, the world’s largest soybean exporter, is prompting Chinese buyers to snatch up US supplies.】

item.title: 冷藏公司 Lineage 据称寻求 30 亿美元以上的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，物流巨头 Lineage 正寻求在美国首次公开募股中融资 30 多亿美元，这将是今年规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Logistics giant Lineage is seeking to raise more than $3 billion in a US initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be the largest listing this year.】

item.title: 特鲁多的竞争对手反对提高资本利得税，承诺新的减税政策
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）表示，他将投票反对政府提高资本利得税含税税率的提议，从而结束了数周来人们对他在这一问题上的立场的猜测。【原文：Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre said he will vote against the government’s proposal to raise the capital gains tax inclusion rate, ending weeks of speculation about where he would land on the issue.】

item.title: 尽管面临主要风险，国债拍卖仍吸引了强劲需求
item.description: 尽管周三可能会发生破坏稳定的事件，但 10 年期债券的拍卖还是吸引了异常强劲的需求，债券因此反弹，抹去了上周强劲的就业数据造成的部分损失。【原文：Bonds rallied — erasing some of the losses caused by last week’s strong employment data — after an auction of 10-year notes drew unusually strong demand despite its proximity to potentially destabilizing events on Wednesday.】

item.title: 法国央行下调经济增长预期，原因是预算削减被认为会产生影响
item.description: 法国央行下调了对未来两年经济增长的预测，因为其中包括对能源价格的更高假设，以及削减开支以弥补预算赤字对经济活动的打击。【原文：The Bank of France cut its growth forecasts for the next two years as it included higher assumptions for energy prices and a hit to activity from spending cuts to close down the budget deficit.】

item.title: 银行领导称房地产之痛仍局限于办公室
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）和 PNC 金融服务集团（PNC Financial Services Group Inc.【原文：Commercial real estate risks remain manageable across most sectors, though office buildings will continue to plague lenders, according to executives at Wells Fargo & Co. and PNC Financial Services Group Inc.】

item.title: Allied Properties 因写字楼空置问题被穆迪降至 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二将 Allied Properties Real Estate 房地产公司的评级下调至垃圾级，理由是这家加拿大写字楼业主的债务水平较高，而且出租率下降将影响其履行债务的能力。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded Allied Properties Real Estate to junk status on Tuesday, citing the Canadian office landlord’s high debt levels, as well as weakening occupancy rates that will weigh on its ability to meet its obligations.】

item.title: 财政风险扭曲了巴西掉期对加息的定价
item.description: 对巴西控制财政赤字能力的怀疑不断增加，引发了投资头寸的突然变化，扭曲了该国的掉期利率市场。【原文：Mounting skepticism over Brazil’s ability to control its fiscal deficit has triggered such sudden changes in investment positions that it has distorted the country’s swap rates market.】
